caption:
🌲🔊 One of my favorite parts of the creative process is recording sounds in nature—birds, wind, water, footsteps—and bringing them back into the studio as source material.

There’s something incredible about reconnecting with nature through sound… it grounds you, opens you up, and reminds you that music is everywhere if you listen closely. 🎶🌿

If you’re heading out on a nature walk, I highly recommend taking a moment to really listen—you might just find a rhythm, a melody, or even a moment of stillness that stays with you long after. 🎧

#EastForest #NatureSounds #FieldRecording #ListeningToNature  #NatureWalks  #MindfulListening
